page.title: 04Traffic
page.content: The whole area is very busy from 8.00 to 9.00am and from 4.00 to 6.30pm,when all the rush hour traffic goes into, and out of London. On Wednesday 19 June,Blackfen pupils surveyed the A2,which is the busiest road in S.E.London,and found that between 8.00 and 8.30am 1525 cars and 72 lorries and coaches went towards London.Another 432 cars and 34 lorries turned off to Blackfen. On 24 June only 413 cars and 110 lorries and coaches were going to London between 12.15 and 12.45pm. A similar pattern of traffic movement was found on Bellegrove Road. GNISU04560135
